ti:edition.ti:label: De Cherubim
ti:edition.ti:description: Philo Judaeus. Cohn, Leonard, editor. Opera quae supersunt, Volume 1. Berlin: Reimer, 1896.

ti:translation.ti:label: De Cherubim
ti:translation.ti:description: Philo of Alexandria, "A TREATISE ON THE CHERUBIM; AND ON THE FLAMING SWORD; AND ON THE FIRST-BORN CHILD OF MAN, CAIN," translator: Charles Duke Yonge (George Bell and Sons, London, 1854)
